location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū], to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a statement of presents received and expended (not present) from the date of the Resident's departure from Bombay (to take charge of the Bushire Residency) to the present date.
